formalpara.title: Internal help for this AGI command in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: DATABASE PUT <family> <key> <value> Adds or updates an entry in the Asterisk database for a given family, key, and value. Returns 1 if successful, 0 otherwise.

formalpara.title: Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.2 to 1.4:
Diff of the internal help from Asterisk 1.4 to 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -2,3 +2,4 @@ Adds or updates an entry in the Asterisk database for a given family, key, and value. Returns 1 if successful, 0 otherwise. + Runs Dead : Yes
